name: MatchMonsters for ANDROID
description:
Hi everyone, this is a 48h project for android.

********************************************************

DESCRIPTION

********************************************************

This is a free monogame project made for android.

It is a simple match3 style game.

The project was coded in visual studio 2019, in C# langage.

It take me 48hours to build it. (Of course, I'm not a newbie 

in C# monogame, but this is my first project for android devices).

Hope you'll enjoy it.

********************************************************

INSTALLATION

********************************************************

English:

Hello, thank you for downloading this project. 

Inside the .zip file, open the file :

MatchMonsterAndroid.MatchMonsterAndroid-Signed.apk

Then choose yes for the installation.

Have fun!!!

Français :

Bonjour, merci d'avoir téléchargé ce projet pour y jouer.

Pour l'installer sur ton smartphone, il faut ouvrir le fichier :

MatchMonsterAndroid.MatchMonsterAndroid-Signed.apk

ensuite des messages pour valider l'installation vont s'afficher.

bon jeu
